message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $180 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $180. Would you be willing to meet me at $220?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I am still aiming to keep my spending within $150. I would like to propose $200 as a counteroffer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm still a bit above your target. How about we meet at $230?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I am still committed to staying within my budget. I am willing to pay $210 for the product.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $210, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more. How about we try $220 one last time?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I am confident that we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to pay $215 for the product.
I think we're really close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $215, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more. How about we try $220 one last time?
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $217 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $217, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more. How about we try $220 one last time?
